channel.title: 1.7.8.x on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in 1.7.8.x on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.11 Is Available
item.description: A security patch for PrestaShop 1.7 is now available.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.10 Is Available
item.description: A security patch for PrestaShop 1.7 is now available.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.9 is available
item.description: Security patch for PrestaShop 1.7 is now available.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8 is now in the extended support phase
item.description: Now that PrestaShop 8.0 is out, here is a focus on maintained branches of the PrestaShop project and what to expect.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.8 Is Available
item.description: It has been decided to deliver a new maintenance release for 1.7.8.x branch. Please note that this will be the last regular 1.7.8.x patch version, as the branch now enters security-only maintenance phase. Next regular patches will now target 8.0.x branch.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.8.7
item.description: PrestaShop version 1.7.8.7 is now available. This release fixes one important security issue, read this article for more information.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.8.6
item.description: It has been decided to deliver a new maintenance release for 1.7.8.X branch.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.8.5
item.description: Due to a critical regression , it has been decided to deliver a new maintenance release for 1.7.8 branch.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.8.4
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.8.4 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 23 bugs and feature request.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.8.3
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.8.3 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 25 bugs and 1 security issue since the 1.7.8.2 release.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.8.2
item.description: The ongoing work on security for PrestaShop software continues. We have identified and fixed a new security issue, it has been decided to deliver a new maintenance release for 1.7.8.X branch.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.8.1
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.8.1 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 44 regressions reported since the initial 1.7.8.0 release.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.0 is available
item.description: We are happy to announce PrestaShop 1.7.8.0 is officially available!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.0 RC1 Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: A few months after the beta, the first release candidate for PrestaShop 1.7.8.0 is now ready for you to test!
